root.str: Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 19 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 shells.

The "Alchemist" Punisher is a highly-customizable PDW designed with close-quarters aggression in mind. The stock underbarrel grenade launcher can be modified to fire class-specific ammunition instead. All factions can use NS weapons.
Collect Exposed A7 Data Nodes found out in the world.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 25 shells.
Gather intel by spotting targets or sabotage enemy facilities by hacking or destroying terminals, turrets, generators, or SCUs.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 14 shells.
Nice work, soldier. The derelict fleet carrier has been defeated. Here's a little bonus to tide you over until payday.
Earn experience by gathering intel or sabotaging enemy facilities.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 11 shells.
Earn kills using Black Market weapons.

Energizes a shield for 2.5 seconds that absorbs up to 2000 damage. A main cannon fired while this ability is active will inflict the Havoc condition on a direct hit, preventing enemy vehicles from being repaired for 6 seconds. Can be activated once every 25 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 34 shells.
The prototype Perihelion VXC fires an anti-armor crescent with a flat trajectory, and can be charged to fire up to three projectiles at once. VS use only.

//uplink established//decrypting//...//
//status: secure//receiving message//
My client is seeking an operative to gather intel and cause havoc on the battlefield. This specialist must not be seen, so actions will need to be performed while cloaked. Once completed, funds will be discreetly transferred to your account.
//end of message//..//uplink terminated//
Get this bundled set of PMC infantry helmets and armors. For NC use only.
An unaligned fleet carrier just dropped planetside, soldier! We must destroy the carrier to stop it from disrupting the battle lines.
With quick and snappy target acquisition, the Glacain RF excels at short range engagements.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Nalla:</font> We recently started receiving static on communication channels utilizing transponder signals used by vessels that have been lost since the expedition. Technicians assure me that everything is functioning within optimal parameters. Maybe someone is playing a sick prank?
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 9 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 shells.

//uplink established//decrypting//...//
//status: secure//receiving message//
I have a mutually beneficial offer for you. My client is seeking an operative to infiltrate one of your enemy's facilities to turn their turrets against them. Once completed, funds will be quietly transferred to your account.
//end of message//..//uplink terminated//
Eliminate enemies designated as High Value Targets.
High value targets are players who have accepted any NS daily missions or subterfuge missions.
The derelict fleet carrier has defeated. A victory well earned, acolyte. You will be rewarded in kind.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 shells.

Rain the light of righteousness down on your foes. This cosmetically modified NS-R3 Swarm launcher allows the user to tailor the weapon's tracking capabilities between high and low velocity rockets, each able to lock onto ground or air targets. <font color="#dc9c36">Required Lockon: Aircraft or Armor</font>

Amidst the sprawling battlefields, the insidious sprouting of the SpacePumpkin swarms sow chaos throughout Auraxis!

  • The Halloween Event is in full swing, with some new goodies to see and do.
  • A new Seasonal Directive is available and ends with a "Wicked" reward!
  • Find and destroy SpacePumpkins and the rare Galact-O-Lanterns on each continent, but beware, something larger and far more dangerous lurks.
  • The Depot is filled with limited-time camos, weapons, and cosmetics.
Reduces the buoyancy of the vehicle for a limited time.

Energizes a shield for 2.5 seconds that absorbs up to 2000 damage. A main cannon fired while this ability is active will inflict the Havoc condition on a direct hit, preventing enemy vehicles from being repaired for 6 seconds. Can be activated once every 22 seconds.

Shine the light of righteousness on the foes of the Terran Republic. This cosmetically modified M77-B's precision craftsmanship delivers a balance of stopping power, accuracy, and rate of fire. TR use only.

//uplink established//decrypting//...//
//status: secure//receiving message//
My client is seeking an operative to disable or destroy secondary systems at bases. This task aligns well with your faction's goals, so there will be no conflict of interests. Once completed, you will be discreetly compensated for your efforts.
//end of message//..//uplink terminated//
Lost Fleet Carrier has stolen [*facility*] from the [*faction*]!

The Dawnbreaker's BBS-7 uses a mil-dot reticle and 7x magnification.

Hold Sprint to steady aim.
Reduces the buoyancy of the vehicle for up to 5 seconds, and can be deactivated prematurely. Descent takes place more rapidly while stationary. 20 second cooldown.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon.

The Dawnbreaker's BBS-10 uses a mil-dot reticle and 10x magnification.

Hold Sprint to steady aim.
Capture contribution experience is earned when standing near a capture point or eliminating attackers and defenders at capture points while the facility is in the process of being captured.
Looks like the derelict fleet carrier got away. The folks that sign your checks look less than pleased with your performance, but I'm sure it's fine.
A 12x magnitude zoom precision sniper scope.
Shine the light of righteousness on the foes of the Nanite Systems Operatives. This cosmetically modified SR-100 enables rapid follow-up shots to eliminate targets at long range. NSO use only.
Squad and vehicle spawn experience will not count toward the completion of this objective.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 3 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 22 shells.
Kill enemy players with base turret.
Gather intel by spotting targets or sabotage enemy facilities by hacking or destroying terminals, turrets, generators, or SCUs to earn credit toward this ribbon.
Killing enemies hides you from radar temporarily on land, and permanently underwater.

//uplink established//decrypting//...//
//status: secure//receiving message//
My client is looking for someone to get their hands dirty and an informant pointed me in your direction. We need you to eliminate enemies in close quarters with a blade or submachine gun. Once completed your funds will be discreetly transferred to your account.
//end of message//..//uplink terminated//
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 17 shells.

//uplink established//decrypting//...//
//status: secure//receiving message//
My client has identified several individuals that have been designated as high value targets and is willing to pay to have them eliminated. This work is not for everyone, but rest assured, the targets you will be eliminating are enemies of your faction and you will be rewarded, discreetly, for your efforts.
//end of message//..//uplink terminated//

Coats the barrel with a cerulean concoction that prevents the player from appearing on the minimap when firing and reduces the weapons muzzle flash and noise generation. In exchange, the weapon's damage falls off 10 meters sooner and bullet velocity is reduced by 15%
The derelict fleet carrier has escaped. This has been noted in the field report. The brass isn't going to like this.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 32 shells.
Shine the light of righteousness on the foes of the New Conglomerate. This cosmetically modified NC14 Bolt Driver boasts impressive stopping power without sacrificing versatility. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 27 shells.
The derelict fleet carrier has been forcibly removed from the continent. You have been rewarded for your efforts, soldier.

//uplink established//decrypting//...//
//status: secure//receiving message//
My client is in the market for a skilled marksman, someone that can eliminate targets at long range with a sniper rifle. Once the job is done the payment will be quietly deposited into your account.
//end of message//..//uplink terminated//

When the expedition was pulled through the wormhole in 2640, dozens of ships were lost never to be heard from again. That is until a derelict fleet carrier appeared out of nowhere next to one of our long-range sensor stations with a transponder that matched one of the lost vessels'. Before crews could board it, the ship's engines ignited, spewing radiation, and it rushed toward Auraxis. It refused to answer any of our hails, so we destroyed the carrier and watched the burning husk fall through the atmosphere. Since then, we've received multiple confirmed sightings of the vessel terrorizing the battlefields across the continents. We don't know if it is the same ship or another. Either way it must be stopped.
Damage derelict carrier weak points or enemy aircraft during the Forgotten Fleet Carrier alert.

The Dawnbreaker's versatile Blessed Bolt Scope uses a mil-dot reticle and 6x magnification.

Hold Sprint to steady aim.
Reduces the buoyancy of the vehicle for up to 5 seconds, and can be deactivated prematurely. Descent takes place more rapidly while stationary. 26 second cooldown.
Destroy enemy vehicle with base turret.
I have been informed the derelict fleet carrier has been successfully repelled. Well done, operative. Payment has been transferred.
Must be in a base turret at an enemy facility to earn credit toward the completion of this objective.
An unaligned fleet carrier has dropped planetside, soldier! It is disrupting the battle lines and must be restored at all costs!

//uplink established//decrypting//...//
//status: secure//receiving message//
My organization is seeking a soldier that has the means and skills to capture facilities. We will not elaborate further, but this should be an easy win for you and your faction. Once completed, funds will be discreetly transferred to your account and you may even earn some recognition from your superiors.
//end of message//..//uplink terminated//
Kill enemy players with a melee weapon or SMG.

The Dawnbreaker's BBS-12 uses a mil-dot reticle and 12x magnification.

Hold Sprint to steady aim.
I have been informed that the derelict fleet carrier has exited the continent. This failure will be noted in the field report, operative.
Destroy the weak points on the derelict fleet carrier.
For those who desire more precision in close quarters, the Paracelsus reflex optic offers a 2x zoom.

Energizes a shield for 2.5 seconds that absorbs up to 2000 damage. A main cannon fired while this ability is active will inflict the Havoc condition on a direct hit, preventing enemy vehicles from being repaired for 6 seconds. Can be activated once every 30 seconds.

The Dawnbreaker's BBS-8 uses a mil-dot reticle and 8x magnification.

Hold Sprint to steady aim.
Reduces the buoyancy of the vehicle for up to 5 seconds, and can be deactivated prematurely. Descent takes place more rapidly while stationary. 23 second cooldown.

Coats the barrel with a golden concoction that reduces vertical recoil by 30% and increases hipfire cone of fire by 15%. The added concussion causes the player to show on the minimap 35m farther away.

//uplink established//decrypting//...//
//status: secure//receiving message//
A mutual acquaintance informed me of your skill with 'off the books' missions. My client would like to borrow your comms to upload some questionable data to a competitor the next time you are near an enemy capture point. When completed the funds would be discreetly transferred to your account.
//end of message//..//uplink terminated//
The Ventura mid-range optic allows for quick target acquisition with a high-contrast crosshair reticle, and 3.4x zoom depth.
Complete a Mini-Alert: The Lost Fleet
Kill enemy players at long range with a sniper rifle.
An unaligned fleet carrier has dropped planetside near your location. All NS Operatives have been directed to destroy the carrier at any cost.
Shine the light of righteousness on the foes of the Vanu Sovereignty. This cosmetically modified bolt-action XM98's imbues unparalleled versatility on the battlefield. VS use only.
Coats the barrel with a crimson concoction that reduces visibility of the weapon's muzzle flash, but increases the range at which you appear on enemy minimaps by 15 meters.
An unaligned fleet carrier has arrived planetside. Destroy the carrier and prevent it from disrupting the lines of battle.
An automated missile battery with a rotating delivery system capable of firing rockets at threats in any direction.

Energizes a shield for 2.5 seconds that absorbs up to 2000 damage. A main cannon fired while this ability is active will inflict the Havoc condition on a direct hit, preventing enemy vehicles from being repaired for 6 seconds. Can be activated once every 20 seconds.

The Dawnbreaker's NBS-6 has 6x magnification and highlights targets with thermal imagery.

Hold Sprint to steady aim.
Destroy or drive off the derelict fleet carrier.

//uplink established//decrypting//...//
//status: secure//receiving message//
My client requires the assistance of a skilled driver to deliver sensitive messages to designated bases. I was informed through a mutual acquaintance that you have the expertise we are looking for. Retrieve the preloaded Harasser from a Warpgate. You will be discreetly compensated upon completion of the task.
//end of message//..//uplink terminated//
Reduces the buoyancy of the vehicle for up to 5 seconds, and can be deactivated prematurely. Descent takes place more rapidly while stationary. 30 second cooldown.
Changes the size of Player and Vehicle HUD Indicator Icons.
The derelict fleet carrier has fled the continent. The Vanu Sovereignty is disappointed with your failure to eliminate the threat.
Enemies are considered at long range when at least 70 meters away.
